message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your life.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a price of $750000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm afraid I can't accept your offer of $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $825000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and my own investment.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your offer, but I am still looking to keep my expenses within my set budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $775000 for the product.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to work with you. However, I still need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer the product to you for $812500. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value and my own investment.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $790000 for the product.

I understand you're getting close to your budget, Bob, but I still need to get a better offer. I'm willing to make one last concession and offer the product to you for $807500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and my own investment.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget constraints, I would like to counter with an offer of $795000 for the product.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I still need to get a bit closer to my target price. I'm willing to make one last concession and offer the product to you for $808000. This is the final price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and my own investment.
Considering our previous discussions and negotiations, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I would like to counter with an offer of $798000 for the product.
